metadata.name: Atera Agent Installation
metadata.comment: Detects successful installation of Atera Remote Monitoring & Management (RMM) agent as recently found to be used by Conti operators

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 1033 AND lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('msiinstaller') AND contains(lower(message), lower('ateraagent')))

output.summary: Detects successful installation of Atera Remote Monitoring & Management (RMM) agent as recently found to be used by Conti operators

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate Atera agent installation Reference: https://www.advintel.io/post/secret-backdoor-behind-conti-ransomware-operation-introducing-atera-agent
